description: Get list of conversations the user should be a member of but may be missing locally

main.description: Returns conversations where the user is a member on the server but may not have local MLS state

deviceId.description: Optional device ID to check. Defaults to current device from auth token

conversations.description: List of conversations the user should be in

memberCount.description: Number of active members in conversation

shouldBeInGroup.description: Whether this device should be in the MLS group

lastActivity.description: Timestamp of last activity in conversation

needsRejoin.description: Whether user has an active rejoin request for this conversation

deviceInGroup.description: Whether the specific device is currently in the MLS group
